nodes.bodyText: Standard procedure: first deprecate/internalize on master, merge master into PMD 7, then merge this PR...
It seems we moved the JavaTokenManager as well from lang.java to sub-package lang.java.ast - without noting this incompatibility...
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,22 +1,21 @@
-/**
+/*
  * BSD-style license; for more info see http://pmd.sourceforge.net/license.html
  */
 
-package net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.vm;
+package net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.vm.ast;

nodes.bodyText: I think, it makes sense to internalize the VmTokenManager as well on master - the access should be through LanguageVersionHandler#getParser#getTokenManager and the interface TokenManager should be used.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,22 +1,21 @@

  */

+package net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.vm.ast;
